#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Requirements =
 * ruby
 * rubygems
 * ruby additional libs lib: stomp, 
 * java jdk 1.5
 * JMS broker like apache activemq o fuse message broker

= Usage =

Create/change a configuration file settings.yaml 

Now in one console run

 ruby wg.rb settings.yaml init
 ruby wg.rb settings.yaml dump_results

Now in 1 or more consoles (and maybe on different computers) run

* ruby wg.rb settings.yaml run
